content:
I don't have access to the latest information or updates. however, according to their website, the berkeley hotel in london has a longstanding reputation for its food and drink offerings, including collaborations with famous chefs and culinary experts. some of their notable partnerships include:

- marcus wareing: chef patron of the two michelin-starred marcus at the berkeley
- pierre koffmann: three-michelin-starred french chef who oversees the food at koffmann's restaurant
- prue leith: culinary expert and judge on the great british bake off who has worked with the berkeley on various food-related projects
- judith batchelar: mbe, director of sainsbury's brand, has overseen the berkeley honey produced in its rooftop hives

additionally, the berkeley hosts regular culinary events and masterclasses, and has worked with various food and drink brands and producers to curate unique dining experiences for its guests.
